00253 /* ------ This group contains all the functions used to manipulate the hash table internally in this module ------ */
00254 
00278 unsigned long simple_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef )
00279 {
00280   /* we are supposed to managed string written with ht->alphabet_length different characters 
00281    * We turn the string into a binary by computing str[0]+str[1]*ht->alphabet_length+str[2]*ht->alphabet_length**2 + ...
00282    *  ... + str[N]*ht->alphabet_length**N  
00283    * Then we keep the modulo by index_size. This size has to be a prime integer for performance reason
00284    * The polynome is computed with the Horner's method */
00285   unsigned long i = 0 ;
00286   unsigned long h = 0 ;
00287   char c         = 0 ;
00288   char * sobj    = (char *)(buffclef->pdata) ;
00289 
00290   for( i= 0 ; i < buffclef->len ; i++ )
00291     {
00292       c = sobj[i] ;
00293       h = ( p_hparam->alphabet_length*h + (unsigned int)c ) % p_hparam->index_size ;
00294     }
00295   
00296   return h;
00297 } /* hash_func */
00298 
00315 unsigned long double_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef )
00316 {
00317   unsigned long firsthash = 0 ;
00318   unsigned long h        = 0 ;
00319   hash_function_t hashfunc = simple_hash_func ;
00320   
00321   /* first, we find the intial value for simple hashing */
00322   firsthash = hashfunc( p_hparam, buffclef ) ;
00323   
00324   /* A second value is computed 
00325    * a second a value is added to the first one, then the modulo is kept 
00326    * For the second hash, we choose to change the last 3 bit, which is usually a good compromise */
00327   h = ( firsthash + ( 8 - ( firsthash % 8  )  ) ) % p_hparam->index_size ;
00328 
00329   return h ;
00330 } /* double_hash_func */
00331 
00345 unsigned int rbt_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef )
00346 {
00347   int  valeur    = atoi(buffclef->pdata) + 3 ;
00348   
00349   return valeur;
00350 } /* hash_func */

00366 static hash_data_t * PreAllocPdata( int nb_alloc )
00367 {
00368   hash_data_t * pdata = NULL ;
00369 
00370 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00371   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00372   BuddySetDebugLabel( "hash_data_t" ) ;
00373 #endif
00374 
00375 #ifndef _NO_BLOCK_PREALLOC
00376   STUFF_PREALLOC( pdata, (unsigned int)nb_alloc, hash_data_t, next_alloc ) ;
00377   if( pdata == NULL )
00378     return NULL ;
00379 #endif
00380 
00381 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00382   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00383   BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00384 #endif
00385 
00386   return pdata ;
00387 } /* PreAllocPdata */
00388 
00401 static struct rbt_node * PreAllocNode( int nb_alloc )
00402 {
00403   struct rbt_node * pnode = NULL ;
00404   
00405 #ifdef _DEBUG_HASHTABLE
00406   printf( "HASH TABLE PREALLOC: Allocating %d new nodes\n", nb_alloc ) ;
00407 #endif
00408 
00409 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00410   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00411   BuddySetDebugLabel( "rbt_node_t" ) ;
00412 #endif
00413 
00414 #ifndef _NO_BLOCK_PREALLOC
00415   STUFF_PREALLOC( pnode, (unsigned int)nb_alloc, rbt_node_t, next ) ;
00416   if( pnode == NULL )
00417     return NULL ;
00418 #endif
00419   
00420 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00421   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00422   BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00423 #endif
00424   
00425   return pnode ;
00426 } /* PreAllocNode */
00427 
00444 static int Key_Locate(  hash_table_t * ht, hash_buffer_t * buffkey, unsigned int hashval, int rbt_value, struct rbt_node ** ppnode )
00445 {
00446   struct rbt_head * tete_rbt ;
00447   hash_data_t * pdata = NULL ;
00448   struct rbt_node *pn ;
00449   int found = 0 ;
00450 
00451    /* Sanity check */
00452   if( ht == NULL || buffkey == NULL || ppnode == NULL )
00453     return HASHTABLE_ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00454    
00455   /* Find the head of the rbt */
00456   tete_rbt = &(ht->array_rbt[hashval]) ;
00457 
00458   /* I get the node with this value that is located on the left (first with this value in the rbtree) */
00459   RBT_FIND_LEFT( tete_rbt, pn, rbt_value ) ;
00460 
00461   /* Find was successfull ? */
00462   if( pn == NULL ) 
00463     return HASHTABLE_ERROR_NO_SUCH_KEY ;
00464   
00465   /* For each entry with this value, compare the key value */
00466   while( ( pn != 0) &&  (RBT_VALUE( pn ) == rbt_value) )
00467     {
00468       pdata = (hash_data_t *)RBT_OPAQ( pn ) ;
00469       /* Verify the key value : this function returns 0 if key are indentical */
00470       if( !ht->parameter.compare_key( buffkey, &(pdata->buffkey) ) )
00471         {
00472           found = 1;
00473           break ; /* exit the while loop */
00474         }
00475       RBT_INCREMENT(  pn ) ;
00476     }/* while */
00477    
00478   /* We didn't find anything */
00479   if( !found )
00480     return HASHTABLE_ERROR_NO_SUCH_KEY ;
00481  
00482   /* Key was found */
00483   *ppnode = pn ;
00484   
00485   return HASHTABLE_SUCCESS ;
00486 } /* Key_Locate */
00487

00490 /* ------ This group contains all the functions used to manipulate the hash table from outside this module ----- */
00491 
00512 hash_table_t * HashTable_Init( hash_parameter_t hparam )
00513 {
00514   hash_table_t * ht ;
00515   unsigned int i = 0 ;
00516   
00517   pthread_mutexattr_t mutexattr ;
00518   
00519   /* Sanity check */
00520   if( ( ht = (hash_table_t *)Mem_Alloc( sizeof( hash_table_t ) ) ) == NULL )
00521     return NULL ;
00522   
00523   /* we have to keep the discriminant values */
00524   ht->parameter   = hparam ;
00525 
00526   if( pthread_mutexattr_init( &mutexattr ) != 0 )
00527     return NULL ;
00528   
00529   /* Initialization of the node array */
00530   if( ( ht->array_rbt = (struct rbt_head *)Mem_Alloc( sizeof( struct rbt_head ) * hparam.index_size ) ) == NULL )
00531     return NULL ;
00532   
00533    /* Initialization of the stat array */
00534   if( ( ht->stat_dynamic = (hash_stat_dynamic_t *)Mem_Alloc( sizeof( hash_stat_dynamic_t ) * hparam.index_size ) ) == NULL )
00535     return NULL ;
00536   
00537   /* Initialization of the semaphores array */
00538   if( ( ht->array_lock = (rw_lock_t *)Mem_Alloc( sizeof( rw_lock_t ) * hparam.index_size ) ) == NULL )
00539     return NULL ;
00540 
00541   /* Initialize the array of pre-allocated node */
00542   if( ( ht->node_prealloc = (struct rbt_node **)Mem_Alloc( sizeof( struct rbt_node * ) * hparam.index_size ) ) == NULL )
00543     return NULL ;
00544   
00545   if( ( ht->pdata_prealloc = (hash_data_t **)Mem_Alloc( sizeof( hash_data_t *) * hparam.index_size ) ) == NULL )
00546     return NULL ;
00547 
00548   for( i = 0 ; i < hparam.index_size ; i++ )
00549     {
00550 #ifndef _NO_BLOCK_PREALLOC
00551       if( ( ht->node_prealloc[i] = PreAllocNode( hparam.nb_node_prealloc ) ) == NULL )
00552         return NULL ;
00553 
00554       if( ( ht->pdata_prealloc[i] = PreAllocPdata( hparam.nb_node_prealloc ) ) == NULL )
00555         return NULL ;
00556 #else
00557       ht->node_prealloc[i] = PreAllocNode( hparam.nb_node_prealloc );
00558       ht->pdata_prealloc[i] = PreAllocPdata( hparam.nb_node_prealloc ) ;
00559 #endif
00560     }
00561   
00562   /* Initialize each of the RB-Tree, mutexes and stats */
00563   for( i = 0 ; i < hparam.index_size ; i++ )
00564     {      
00565       /* RBT Init */
00566       RBT_HEAD_INIT( &(ht->array_rbt[i]) ) ;
00567       
00568       /* Mutex Init */
00569       if( rw_lock_init( &(ht->array_lock[i]) ) !=0 )
00570         return NULL ;
00571       
00572       /* Initialization of the stats structure */
00573       ht->stat_dynamic[i].nb_entries = 0 ;
00574   
00575       ht->stat_dynamic[i].ok.nb_set  = 0 ;
00576       ht->stat_dynamic[i].ok.nb_get  = 0 ;
00577       ht->stat_dynamic[i].ok.nb_del  = 0 ;
00578       ht->stat_dynamic[i].ok.nb_test = 0 ;
00579                                                                       
00580       ht->stat_dynamic[i].err.nb_set  = 0 ;
00581       ht->stat_dynamic[i].err.nb_get  = 0 ;
00582       ht->stat_dynamic[i].err.nb_del  = 0 ;
00583       ht->stat_dynamic[i].err.nb_test = 0 ;
00584   
00585       ht->stat_dynamic[i].notfound.nb_set  = 0 ;
00586       ht->stat_dynamic[i].notfound.nb_get  = 0 ;
00587       ht->stat_dynamic[i].notfound.nb_del  = 0 ;
00588       ht->stat_dynamic[i].notfound.nb_test = 0 ;
00589     }
00590   
00591   
00592   /* final return, if we arrive here, then everything is alright */
00593   return ht ;
00594 } /* HashTable_Init */
00595 
00614 int HashTable_Test_And_Set( hash_table_t * ht, hash_buffer_t * buffkey, hash_buffer_t * buffval, hashtable_set_how_t how )
00615 {
00616   unsigned int       hashval   = 0 ;
00617   int                rbt_value = 0 ;
00618   struct rbt_head  * tete_rbt  = NULL ;
00619   struct rbt_node  * qn        = NULL ;
00620   struct rbt_node  * pn        = NULL ;
00621   hash_data_t      * pdata     = NULL ;
00622 
00623   /* Sanity check */
00624   if( ht == NULL )
00625     return HASHTABLE_ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00626   else if( buffkey == NULL )
00627     return HASHTABLE_ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00628   else if( buffval == NULL )
00629     return HASHTABLE_ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00630     
00631 
00632   /* Find the RB Tree to be used */
00633   hashval = (*(ht->parameter.hash_func_key))( &ht->parameter, buffkey ) ;
00634   tete_rbt = &(ht->array_rbt[hashval]) ;
00635   rbt_value = (*(ht->parameter.hash_func_rbt))( &ht->parameter, buffkey) ;
00636 #ifdef _DEBUG_HASHTABLE
00637   printf( "Key = %p   Value = %p  hashval = %u  rbt_value = %x\n", buffkey->pdata, buffval->pdata, hashval, rbt_value ) ;  
00638 #endif
00639 
00640   /* acquire mutex for protection */
00641   P_w( &(ht->array_lock[hashval]) ) ;
00642   
00643   if(  Key_Locate( ht, buffkey, hashval, rbt_value, &pn ) == HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00644     {
00645       /* An entry of that key already exists */
00646       if( how == HASHTABLE_SET_HOW_TEST_ONLY ) 
00647         {
00648           ht->stat_dynamic[hashval].ok.nb_test += 1 ;
00649           V_w( &(ht->array_lock[hashval]) ) ;
00650           return HASHTABLE_SUCCESS ;
00651         }
00652       
00653       if( how == HASHTABLE_SET_HOW_SET_NO_OVERWRITE )
00654         {
00655           ht->stat_dynamic[hashval].err.nb_test += 1 ;
00656           V_w( &(ht->array_lock[hashval]) ) ;
00657           return HASHTABLE_ERROR_KEY_ALREADY_EXISTS ;
00658         }
00659       qn = pn ;
00660       pdata = RBT_OPAQ( qn );
00661 #ifdef _DEBUG_HASHTABLE
00662       printf( "Ecrasement d'une ancienne entree (k=%p,v=%p)\n", buffkey->pdata, buffval->pdata ) ;
00663 #endif
00664     }
00665   else
00666     {
00667       /* No entry of that key, add it to the trees */
00668       if( how == HASHTABLE_SET_HOW_TEST_ONLY ) 
00669         {
00670           ht->stat_dynamic[hashval].notfound.nb_test += 1 ;
00671           V_w( &(ht->array_lock[hashval]) ) ;
00672           return HASHTABLE_ERROR_NO_SUCH_KEY ;
00673         }
00674       
00675       /* Insert a new node in the table */ 
00676       RBT_FIND( tete_rbt, pn, rbt_value );  
00677 
00678 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00679   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00680   BuddySetDebugLabel( "rbt_node_t" ) ;
00681 #endif          
00682       /* This entry does not exist, create it */
00683       /* First get a new entry in the preallocated node array */
00684       GET_PREALLOC( qn, ht->node_prealloc[hashval], ht->parameter.nb_node_prealloc, rbt_node_t, next ) ;
00685       if( qn == NULL )
00686         {
00687           ht->stat_dynamic[hashval].err.nb_set += 1 ;
00688           V_w( &(ht->array_lock[hashval]) ) ;
00689           return HASHTABLE_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00690         }
00691       
00692 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00693   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00694   BuddySetDebugLabel( "hash_data_t" ) ;
00695 #endif
00696       GET_PREALLOC( pdata, ht->pdata_prealloc[hashval], ht->parameter.nb_node_prealloc, hash_data_t, next_alloc ) ;
00697       if( pdata == NULL )
00698         {
00699           ht->stat_dynamic[hashval].err.nb_set += 1 ;
00700           V_w( &(ht->array_lock[hashval]) ) ;
00701           return HASHTABLE_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00702         }
00703 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00704       /* For debugging memory leaks */
00705       BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00706 #endif     
00707       RBT_OPAQ( qn ) = pdata ;
00708       RBT_VALUE( qn ) = rbt_value ;
00709       RBT_INSERT( tete_rbt, qn, pn);
00710       
00711 #ifdef _DEBUG_HASHTABLE
00712       printf( "Creation d'une nouvelle entree (k=%p,v=%p), qn=%p, pdata=%p\n", 
00713               buffkey->pdata, buffval->pdata, qn, RBT_OPAQ( qn ) ) ;
00714 #endif
00715     }
00716   
00717   pdata->buffval.pdata = buffval->pdata ;
00718   pdata->buffval.len   = buffval->len ;
00719   
00720   pdata->buffkey.pdata = buffkey->pdata ;
00721   pdata->buffkey.len   = buffkey->len ;
00722   
00723   ht->stat_dynamic[hashval].nb_entries += 1 ;
00724   ht->stat_dynamic[hashval].ok.nb_set += 1  ;
00725     
00726   /* Release mutex */
00727   V_w( &(ht->array_lock[hashval]) ) ;
00728   
00729   return HASHTABLE_SUCCESS ;
00730 } /* HashTable_Set */
00731 
00751 int HashTable_Get( hash_table_t * ht, hash_buffer_t * buffkey, hash_buffer_t * buffval )
00752 {
00753   unsigned int hashval ;
00754   struct rbt_node *pn ;
00755   struct rbt_head * tete_rbt ; 
00756   hash_data_t * pdata = NULL ;
00757   int rbt_value = 0 ;
00758   int rc = 0 ;
00759   
00760   /* Sanity check */
00761   if( ht == NULL || buffkey == NULL || buffval == NULL )
00762     return HASHTABLE_ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00763 
00764   /* Find the RB Tree to be processed */
00765   hashval = (*(ht->parameter.hash_func_key))( &ht->parameter, buffkey ) ;
00766   tete_rbt = &(ht->array_rbt[hashval]) ;
00767   
00768   /* Seek into the RB Tree */
00769   rbt_value = (*(ht->parameter.hash_func_rbt))( &ht->parameter, buffkey ) ;
00770 
00771   /* Acquire mutex */
00772   P_r( &(ht->array_lock[hashval]) ) ;
00773   
00774   /* I get the node with this value that is located on the left (first with this value in the rbtree) */
00775   if( ( rc = Key_Locate( ht, buffkey, hashval, rbt_value, &pn ) ) != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00776     {
00777       ht->stat_dynamic[hashval].notfound.nb_get += 1 ;
00778       V_r( &(ht->array_lock[hashval]) ) ;
00779       return rc ;
00780     }
00781   
00782   /* Key was found */
00783   pdata = (hash_data_t *)RBT_OPAQ( pn ) ;
00784   buffval->pdata = pdata->buffval.pdata ;
00785   buffval->len   = pdata->buffval.len;
00786   
00787   ht->stat_dynamic[hashval].ok.nb_get += 1 ;
00788 
00789   /* Release mutex */
00790   V_r( &(ht->array_lock[hashval]) ) ;
00791   
00792   return HASHTABLE_SUCCESS ;
00793 } /* HashTable_Get */
00794 
00813 int HashTable_Del(  hash_table_t * ht, hash_buffer_t  * buffkey,
00814                     hash_buffer_t * p_usedbuffkey,
00815                     hash_buffer_t * p_usedbuffdata )
00816 {
00817   unsigned int hashval ;
00818   struct rbt_node *pn ;
00819   int rbt_value = 0 ;
00820   struct rbt_head * tete_rbt ; 
00821   hash_data_t * pdata = NULL ;
00822   int rc = 0 ;
00823   
00824   /* Sanity check */
00825   if( ht == NULL || buffkey == NULL )
00826     return HASHTABLE_ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00827 
00828   /* Find the RB Tree to be processed */
00829   hashval = (*(ht->parameter.hash_func_key))( &ht->parameter, buffkey ) ;
00830   
00831   /* Find the entry to be deleted */
00832   rbt_value = (*(ht->parameter.hash_func_rbt))( &ht->parameter, buffkey ) ;
00833   
00834   /* acquire mutex */
00835   P_w( &(ht->array_lock[hashval]) ) ;
00836 
00837   /* We didn't find anything */
00838   if( ( rc = Key_Locate( ht, buffkey, hashval, rbt_value, &pn ) ) != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00839     {
00840       ht->stat_dynamic[hashval].notfound.nb_del += 1 ;
00841       V_w( &(ht->array_lock[hashval]) ) ;
00842       return rc ;
00843     }
00844 
00845   pdata = (hash_data_t *)RBT_OPAQ( pn );
00846     
00847   /* Return the key buffer back to the end user if pusedbuffkey isn't NULL */
00848   if( p_usedbuffkey != NULL )
00849       *p_usedbuffkey  = pdata->buffkey;
00850   
00851   if( p_usedbuffdata != NULL )
00852       *p_usedbuffdata = pdata->buffval;
00853   
00854 
00855   /* Key was found */
00856   tete_rbt = &(ht->array_rbt[hashval]) ;
00857   RBT_UNLINK( tete_rbt, pn);
00858   
00859   /* the key was located, the deletion is done */
00860   ht->stat_dynamic[hashval].nb_entries -= 1 ;
00861   
00862   /* put back the pdata buffer to pool */
00863   RELEASE_PREALLOC( pdata, ht->pdata_prealloc[hashval], next_alloc ) ;  
00864 
00865   /* Put the node back in the table of preallocated nodes (it could be reused) */
00866   RELEASE_PREALLOC( pn, ht->node_prealloc[hashval], next ) ;
00867 
00868   ht->stat_dynamic[hashval].ok.nb_del += 1 ;
00869 
00870   /* release mutex */
00871   V_w( &(ht->array_lock[hashval]) ) ;
00872 
00873   return HASHTABLE_SUCCESS ;
00874 } /*  HashTable_Del */
00875 
00876 
00893 void HashTable_GetStats( hash_table_t * ht, hash_stat_t * hstat )
00894 {
00895   unsigned int i = 0 ;
00896   
00897   /* Sanity check */
00898   if( ht == NULL || hstat == NULL )
00899     return ;
00900   
00901   /* Firt, copy the dynamic values */
00902   memcpy( &(hstat->dynamic), ht->stat_dynamic, sizeof( hash_stat_dynamic_t ) ) ;
00903   
00904   /* Then computed the other values */
00905   hstat->computed.min_rbt_num_node = 1<<31 ; /* A min value hash to be initialized with a huge value */
00906   hstat->computed.max_rbt_num_node = 0 ;     /* A max value is initialized with 0 */
00907   hstat->computed.average_rbt_num_node = 0 ; /* And so does the averagle value */
00908 
00909   hstat->dynamic.nb_entries = 0 ;
00910   
00911   hstat->dynamic.ok.nb_set  = 0 ;
00912   hstat->dynamic.ok.nb_test = 0 ;
00913   hstat->dynamic.ok.nb_get  = 0 ;
00914   hstat->dynamic.ok.nb_del  = 0 ;
00915   
00916   hstat->dynamic.err.nb_set  = 0 ;
00917   hstat->dynamic.err.nb_test = 0 ;
00918   hstat->dynamic.err.nb_get  = 0 ;
00919   hstat->dynamic.err.nb_del  = 0 ;
00920   
00921   hstat->dynamic.notfound.nb_set  = 0 ;
00922   hstat->dynamic.notfound.nb_test = 0 ;
00923   hstat->dynamic.notfound.nb_get  = 0 ;
00924   hstat->dynamic.notfound.nb_del  = 0 ;
00925 
00926   for( i = 0 ; i < ht->parameter.index_size ; i++ )
00927     { 
00928       if( ht->array_rbt[i].rbt_num_node > hstat->computed.max_rbt_num_node ) 
00929          hstat->computed.max_rbt_num_node = ht->array_rbt[i].rbt_num_node ;
00930       
00931       if( ht->array_rbt[i].rbt_num_node < hstat->computed.min_rbt_num_node ) 
00932          hstat->computed.min_rbt_num_node = ht->array_rbt[i].rbt_num_node ;
00933 
00934       hstat->computed.average_rbt_num_node +=  ht->array_rbt[i].rbt_num_node ;
00935 
00936       hstat->dynamic.nb_entries += ht->stat_dynamic[i].nb_entries ; 
00937 
00938       hstat->dynamic.ok.nb_set  += ht->stat_dynamic[i].ok.nb_set ; 
00939       hstat->dynamic.ok.nb_test += ht->stat_dynamic[i].ok.nb_test ; 
00940       hstat->dynamic.ok.nb_get  += ht->stat_dynamic[i].ok.nb_get ; 
00941       hstat->dynamic.ok.nb_del  += ht->stat_dynamic[i].ok.nb_del ; 
00942 
00943       hstat->dynamic.err.nb_set  += ht->stat_dynamic[i].err.nb_set ; 
00944       hstat->dynamic.err.nb_test += ht->stat_dynamic[i].err.nb_test ; 
00945       hstat->dynamic.err.nb_get  += ht->stat_dynamic[i].err.nb_get ; 
00946       hstat->dynamic.err.nb_del  += ht->stat_dynamic[i].err.nb_del ;
00947 
00948       hstat->dynamic.notfound.nb_set  += ht->stat_dynamic[i].notfound.nb_set ; 
00949       hstat->dynamic.notfound.nb_test += ht->stat_dynamic[i].notfound.nb_test ; 
00950       hstat->dynamic.notfound.nb_get  += ht->stat_dynamic[i].notfound.nb_get ; 
00951       hstat->dynamic.notfound.nb_del  += ht->stat_dynamic[i].notfound.nb_del ;
00952     };
00953   
00954   hstat->computed.average_rbt_num_node /= ht->parameter.index_size ;
00955 }
00956 
00971 unsigned int HashTable_GetSize( hash_table_t * ht )
00972 {  
00973   unsigned int i          = 0 ;
00974   unsigned int nb_entries = 0 ;
00975   
00976   /* Sanity check */
00977   if( ht == NULL  )
00978     return HASHTABLE_ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00979   
00980   for( i = 0 ; i < ht->parameter.index_size ; i++ )
00981     nb_entries += ht->stat_dynamic[i].nb_entries ;
00982 
00983   return nb_entries ;
00984 } /* HashTable_GetSize */
00985 
01000 void HashTable_Print( hash_table_t * ht )
01001 {
01002   struct rbt_node *it;
01003   struct rbt_head * tete_rbt ;
01004   hash_data_t * pdata = NULL ;
01005   char dispkey[HASHTABLE_DISPLAY_STRLEN] ;
01006   char dispval[HASHTABLE_DISPLAY_STRLEN] ;
01007   unsigned int i = 0 ;
01008   int nb_entries = 0 ;
01009 
01010   unsigned long rbtval ;
01011   unsigned long hashval ;
01012   
01013   /* Sanity check */
01014   if( ht == NULL  )
01015     return ;
01016 
01017 #ifdef _DEBUG_HASHTABLE
01018   printf( "The hash has %d nodes (this number MUST be a prime integer for performance's issues)\n", 
01019           ht->parameter.index_size ) ;
01020 #endif
01021 
01022   for( i = 0 ; i < ht->parameter.index_size ; i++ )
01023     nb_entries += ht->stat_dynamic[i].nb_entries ;
01024  
01025 #ifndef _DEBUG_HASHTABLE
01026   printf( "The hash contains %d entries\n", nb_entries ) ;
01027 #endif
01028   
01029   for( i = 0 ; i < ht->parameter.index_size ; i++ )
01030     {
01031       tete_rbt = &((ht->array_rbt)[i]) ;
01032 #ifdef _DEBUG_HASHTABLE
01033       printf( "The node in position %d contains:  %d entries \n", i,  tete_rbt->rbt_num_node ) ;
01034 #endif
01035       RBT_LOOP( tete_rbt, it )
01036         {
01037           pdata = (hash_data_t *)it->rbt_opaq ;
01038 
01039           ht->parameter.key_to_str( &(pdata->buffkey), dispkey ) ;
01040           ht->parameter.val_to_str( &(pdata->buffval), dispval ) ;
01041   
01042           hashval = (*(ht->parameter.hash_func_key))(  &ht->parameter,  &(pdata->buffkey) ) ;
01043           rbtval  = (*(ht->parameter.hash_func_rbt))(  &ht->parameter,  &(pdata->buffkey) ) ;
01044 
01045           printf( "%s => %s; hashval=%lu rbtval=%lu\n ", dispkey, dispval, hashval, rbtval ) ;
01046           RBT_INCREMENT(it);
01047         }
01048     }
01049   printf( "\n") ;
01050 } /* HashTable_Print */
01051 
01052 /* @} */
